H0.text: Summerisle is the setting for which 1973 horror film. The Devil's Daughter

H1.text: Summerisle is the setting for which 1973 horror film. Don't Look Now

H2.text: Summerisle is the setting for which 1973 horror film. The Other

H3.text: Summerisle is the setting for which 1973 horror film. The wickerman

A4.text: The plot centres on the visit of a police officer, Sergeant Neil Howie, to the fictional, isolated Scottish island of Summerisle in search of a missing girl.
